name: Slayinger
description:
Early Access

The game is quite empty, but it will be updated and finished soon

Description

It's a game that tells a adventure of a run to reach the legendary tower, will you survive the waves of enemies and discover what secrets awaits?

Features (Alpha v0.1.1)
